Necross/ Splattercannon:

The shards peirced his chest and shoulder.  Necross snarled and 
transformed into his gun platform and opened fire on the Maximal with 
everything.

Splattercannon shifted his deadly sights to Cyaltron and Necross.  
His fellow minion had sustained some damage, so Splattercannon 
decided it was time to assist Necross.  Darkfate and BlackKnightmare 
could handle Black Fang.  He aimed his beam gatling rifle and opened 
fire on Cyaltron.


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, aerosmith4e@c... wrote:
> Crylatron snarled as he took a shot blowing his right sword out of 
his hand, he ahs continued his charge and was ontop of the bot and 
continued his momentum with his left hand bringing down his crystal 
sword at the bot and firing shards of crystal from the jewel on his 
chest.
